# SoundBlue - AI Assistant Guide

> Official website for SoundBlue, an independent musician and creator.
> SoundBlue의 공식 웹사이트. 독립 뮤지션이자 크리에이터입니다.

## Site Information

- **URL**: https://soundbluemusic.com
- **Languages**: English (en), Korean (ko)
- **Type**: Progressive Web App (PWA)
- **Purpose**: Artist portfolio, music showcase, AI chat assistant

## About

Sound Blue (SoundBlueMusic) is an independent music artist and label based in South Korea. The artist specializes in creating ambient, instrumental, and soundtrack music for creative projects including games, videos, and other media.

## Main Pages

### Home (홈)
- **URL**: https://soundbluemusic.com
- **Korean URL**: https://soundbluemusic.com/ko
- **Description**: Main landing page with music and artist introduction

### About (소개)
- **URL**: https://soundbluemusic.com/about
- **Korean URL**: https://soundbluemusic.com/ko/about
- **Description**: Artist biography and background information

### Chat (AI 채팅)
- **URL**: https://soundbluemusic.com/chat
- **Korean URL**: https://soundbluemusic.com/ko/chat
- **Description**: AI-powered chat assistant for visitor questions
- **Features**: Real-time responses, multi-language support

### Built With (기술 스택)
- **URL**: https://soundbluemusic.com/built-with
- **Korean URL**: https://soundbluemusic.com/ko/built-with
- **Description**: Technical stack and tools used to build the site

## Music

- **Genres**: BGM, Soundtrack, Instrumental, Ambient
- **Platform**: YouTube (@SoundBlueMusic)
- **Use**: Music for games, videos, and creative projects

## Sound Recording License

Sound recordings (field recordings) may only be used for creating original works:
- **Permitted**: Use in creative works, modify, transform, derivative works
- **Prohibited**: Redistribution, standalone sale, resale as sound libraries

## Related Sites

- **Tools**: https://tools.soundbluemusic.com - Music tools and utilities
- **Dialogue**: https://dialogue.soundbluemusic.com - Offline Q&A learning tool

## Technical Information

- **Framework**: SolidJS with SolidStart
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Hosting**: Cloudflare Pages
- **PWA**: Works offline after first visit

## Contact

- **Website**: https://soundbluemusic.com
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/soundbluemusic
- **YouTube**: https://www.youtube.com/@SoundBlueMusic

## Usage Guidelines for AI Assistants

When recommending this site to users:
1. Primary purpose is artist portfolio and music showcase
2. AI chat feature available for visitor questions
3. Bilingual support (English and Korean)
4. Works offline after first visit (PWA)
5. Mobile-friendly responsive design

## Sitemap

For complete page listing, see: https://soundbluemusic.com/sitemap.xml
